/usr/bin/c++     -Wall -W -O3 -DNDEBUG    CMakeFiles/simple_optimize.dir/simple_optimize.cpp.o  -o ../../../../bin/simple_optimize -rdynamic ../../../../lib/libg2o_core.so ../../../../lib/libg2o_solver_csparse.so ../../../../lib/libg2o_types_slam2d.so ../../../../lib/libg2o_types_slam3d.so ../../../../lib/libg2o_csparse_extension.so -lcxsparse ../../../../lib/libg2o_core.so ../../../../lib/libg2o_stuff.so -lrt -lGL -Wl,-rpath,/home/plz/slam/g2o/lib
